content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の心を見れば、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you look into your own heart,"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが相手の心である。","translatedEnglishLine":"that is the heart of the other person."},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"身も心も一つになる喜び、","translatedEnglishLine":"The joy of becoming one in body and soul,"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、それだけを二人は感じていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"that was all the two of them felt."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、ゆっくり……","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, slowly..."},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"磁石が引き合うように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Like magnets pulling each other,"},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"互いの心が、引き合う。","translatedEnglishLine":"their hearts drew toward each other."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"　相変わらず、俺が無視されてる気がする……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I still feel like I'm being ignored...\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ギャーーーー！　なんだーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaah! What the heck!?!\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは突然のことだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It happened suddenly."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"室内が光に満たされる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The room was filled with light."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルはいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel was gone."},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hausel was gone."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルはいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel was there."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルはいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hausel was there."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は、一人に。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two became one."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"無の存在に。","translatedEnglishLine":"An existence of nothingness."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ららら、ランス様！　大丈夫ですかー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"La la la, Lord Rance! Are you alright!?\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんかここからすっげー音したですけど！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Something made a huge noise from here!?\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケケケ！　バスガス爆発許可局局長事件簿！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehehe! The head of the Permit Bureau for Bus Gas Explosions’ case files!?\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼル様ー！　大丈夫ですかー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Hausel! Are you alright!?\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、ええええええ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what the heck!?\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"扉を開くと、そこは空が広がっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"When they opened the door, the sky was spread out there."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"バックリと――","translatedEnglishLine":"Wide open—"},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"球形に部屋がえぐられていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A spherical section of the room was hollowed out."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ、お前らか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, it’s you guys!\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼルとサイゼルが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hausel and Saizel,"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピカーッと光ったと思ったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought they flashed brightly,"},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　合体してあんな姿に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and then merged into that form...\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、ユキに火炎！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, fire at Yuki!"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ありゃいったいなんなんだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What on earth is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、な、ななななな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-w-wha-what……\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんなんですか、あの人ー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who the heck is that person!?\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、お前も知らんのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don’t know either?\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、この部屋の惨状はどしたん？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, what happened to this room’s wreckage?"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すっげ風通し良くなってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"The ventilation sure improved a lot.\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分からん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あそこで空中にプカプカ浮いてる奴が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one floating there in midair,"},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多分やったんだと思うが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"probably did it, I think…\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems that..."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　近くにいるだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"just being nearby,"},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　危険な存在のようです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it is a dangerous existence…\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃあああああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaa!?!\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"バシン！　バシン！","translatedEnglishLine":"Bang! Bang!"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きな音を立てる度に、","translatedEnglishLine":"With each loud noise,"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"バスワルドの周囲の空間が削られる。","translatedEnglishLine":"the space around Baswald was being carved away."},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おととと！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, whoa, whoa!"},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、シィル、大丈夫か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Seel, are you okay!?\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes!\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、なんて迷惑な！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Darn it, what a nuisance!"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　力が暴走してるって感じだぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like the power is going out of control!\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、二人が話している間も、","translatedEnglishLine":"While the two were talking,"},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"室内が破壊されていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"the interior kept getting destroyed."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey!\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルー！　ハウゼルー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizel! Hausel!\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you look into your own heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが相手の心である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that is the heart of the other person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も心も一つになる喜び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The joy of becoming one in body and soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、それだけを二人は感じていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was all the two of them felt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 磁石が引き合うように、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their hearts drew toward each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず、俺が無視されてる気がする……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I still feel like I'm being ignored..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギャーーーー！　なんだーーー！？」
それは突然のことだった。
室内が光に満たされる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room was filled with light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ららら、ランス様！　大丈夫ですかー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "La la la, Lord Rance! Are you alright!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんかここからすっげー音したですけど！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something made a huge noise from here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケケケ！　バスガス爆発許可局局長事件簿！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe! The head of the Permit Bureau for Bus Gas Explosions’ case files!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル様ー！　大丈夫ですかー！？」
扉を開くと、そこは空が広がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they opened the door, the sky was spread out there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 球形に部屋がえぐられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A spherical section of the room was hollowed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピカーッと光ったと思ったら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then merged into that form..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありゃいったいなんなんだ！？」
「で、この部屋の惨状はどしたん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what happened to this room’s wreckage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっげ風通し良くなってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ventilation sure improved a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこで空中にプカプカ浮いてる奴が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one floating there in midair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分やったんだと思うが……」
危険な存在のようです……」
大きな音を立てる度に、
バスワルドの周囲の空間が削られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the space around Baswald was being carved away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力が暴走してるって感じだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like the power is going out of control!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、二人が話している間も、
室内が破壊されていく。
サイゼルー！　ハウゼルー！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you look into your own heart,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが相手の心である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that is the heart of the other person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も心も一つになる喜び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The joy of becoming one in body and soul,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、それだけを二人は感じていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was all the two of them felt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 磁石が引き合うように、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: their hearts drew toward each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相変わらず、俺が無視されてる気がする……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I still feel like I'm being ignored..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ギャーーーー！　なんだーーー！？」

室内が光に満たされる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room was filled with light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ららら、ランス様！　大丈夫ですかー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "La la la, Lord Rance! Are you alright!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんかここからすっげー音したですけど！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something made a huge noise from here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケケケ！　バスガス爆発許可局局長事件簿！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe! The head of the Permit Bureau for Bus Gas Explosions’ case files!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハウゼル様ー！　大丈夫ですかー！？」
扉を開くと、そこは空が広がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When they opened the door, the sky was spread out there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 球形に部屋がえぐられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A spherical section of the room was hollowed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピカーッと光ったと思ったら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and then merged into that form..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありゃいったいなんなんだ！？」
「で、この部屋の惨状はどしたん？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what happened to this room’s wreckage?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっげ風通し良くなってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ventilation sure improved a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこで空中にプカプカ浮いてる奴が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one floating there in midair,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分やったんだと思うが……」
危険な存在のようです……」
大きな音を立てる度に、
バスワルドの周囲の空間が削られる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the space around Baswald was being carved away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力が暴走してるって感じだぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like the power is going out of control!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、二人が話している間も、
室内が破壊されていく。
サイゼルー！　ハウゼルー！
